Sept 30 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I GROUP PLC - DIRECTORATE CHANGE *3I GROUP - DAVID HUTCHISON, CURRENTLY SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR AND CHAIRMAN OF 3I'S VALUATIONS COMMITTEE, WILL BECOME NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 30-SEP-202106:00:02.363 GMT
